word:
Nurses as Missionary Evangelists. 
Ms. 71 '03 (June 18 '03):-- 


     Christ the great Medical Missionary, is our example- Of Him it is written, that He "went about all Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing the sick. In His service, healing and teaching were linked closely together. Today they are not to be separated.
